scripts.build: npm run build --workspaces --if-present && npm run rebuild -w @prodaric/browser-app && npm run build:prod -w @prodaric/browser-app
scripts.ide:build: npm run rebuild --prefix apps/browser-app && npm run build --prefix apps/browser-app
scripts.package:electron:rpm:install: npm run package:electron:rpm -w @prodaric/browser-app && (RPM=$(ls apps/browser-app/rpmbuild/RPMS/x86_64/*.rpm 2>/dev/null | head -1); [ -n "$RPM" ] && sudo dnf install -y --nogpgcheck "$RPM" || echo 'No se encontró .rpm en apps/browser-app/rpmbuild/RPMS/x86_64/')
